about_the_game:
woxinjianghu
I independently developed a large-scale multiplayer online game (MMORPG), which is also a continuation of a childhood dream. I hope it can make everyone feel happy and communicate with each other! I also hope that game enthusiasts can provide more guidance, and I will do my best to improve
The game is mainly based on the big world/sandbox, supporting multiple platforms (Windows macOS、Linux、iOS、Android）
You can fight side by side with your friends anytime, anywhere, and explore the unknown gaming world,
Experience the fun of gaming in both PVE and PVP gameplay
Game features
Endless exploration and adventure: Explore the vast world, challenge powerful bosses and dangerous dungeons.
Rich PVE content: Complete daily tasks, kill bosses to obtain gems and equipment production materials, continuously improve your character's combat power
Passionate PVP battles: Participate in various (large-scale) city battles and resource struggles, compete with other players, and win glory for your team.
Powerful social system: Join guilds, meet like-minded friends, fight and adventure together, conquer territories, and experience gaming fun
Free trading market: Dropped items such as daily tasks, dungeons, bosses, and PvP competitions can be sold on the market
Woxinjianghu is still under continuous development Stay tuned for more exciting content!
Join the game now and embark on your adventure!
detailed_description:
Discord

Discord in the bottom right corner of this page can contact me
If you need to contact me urgently, please email game@woxinjianghu.com

I can see the message and reply to it as soon as possible


About the Game

woxinjianghu
I independently developed a large-scale multiplayer online game (MMORPG), which is also a continuation of a childhood dream. I hope it can make everyone feel happy and communicate with each other! I also hope that game enthusiasts can provide more guidance, and I will do my best to improve
The game is mainly based on the big world/sandbox, supporting multiple platforms (Windows macOS、Linux、iOS、Android）
You can fight side by side with your friends anytime, anywhere, and explore the unknown gaming world,

Rich PVE content: Complete daily tasks, kill bosses to obtain gems and equipment production materials, continuously improve your character's combat power

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD R3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB 显存、NVIDIA GTX 650、AMD Radeon HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

publishers: 广州龙之慧网络科技有限公司

I also hope that all game lovers will give me more advice, and I will try my best to improve...
